title: FPS Problems
body:
Hello there!
Starting today at about 8 PM, I seem to be having a super weird FPS problem. My FPS is stuck at 30 FPS, no matter what I do. If I tab in, it jumps up to 160-200 FPS (which is what I normally play at), then drops back to 30 FPS after about 5 seconds. This happens without fail. I do have the XBOX game bar disabled. Laptop is Samsung Notebook 7 Spin, with a NVIDIA graphics card (latest update).
Send Help Plz

replies.body: I appreciate the troubleshooting so far, including the game bar!  Go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure all possibilities are ruled out, even the chance of bad game files.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
Thank you so much Porocles! I didn't even realize this resource was available! I am back to normal FPS now, so once again thank you :D
